casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mark L. BIBBS. No. 306P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 12, 2006. Allen G. Thomas, Wilson, for Mark L. Bibbs. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 8th day of June 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of June 2006."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 8th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of June 2006."
